page.title: 12CHARLTON THEATRE
page.content: In 1979 several of us decided to stage a pantomime centred on the destruction by speculators and planning departments of North Dorset County Council of the historic site at Clayesmore,in conjunction with the projected development of the village. Although a total failure in stopping villagers acceding to the North Dorset Plan"Snow White" managed to blend a group of over 5OO children and adults. These have developed the theme from past village life to the suburban nonentity of the village now,with its commuter population and dormitory wealth.Productions include Bartholomew Fayre;Beauty&the Beast;Noah;Moby Dick; Birdbrain;A Change of Life;Punch&Judy (according to Cruickshank).The Theatre raises money from local sponsorship and insists on professional production if amateur acting.
